function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possibility of virus reemergence leading to reintroduction of shelter-at-home decrees","Impact":"Disruption to service operations and revenue if not prepared for reintroduction of lockdowns","Mitigation":"Developing flexible business models and remote service delivery capabilities","Technologies":"Remote service delivery platforms (e.g. Zoom, Webex, Teams)","People":"Service organizations","Owner":"Service organization management"},{"Description":"Overwhelm of system due to demand surges","Impact":"Decrease in service quality and customer satisfaction","Mitigation":"Scalable infrastructure and load balancing measures","Technologies":"Scalability solutions for online platforms","People":"Service organizations, technology teams","Owner":"Service organization technology teams"}]}
